name: Skate
description:
IMPORTANT:

The grass is very demanding. I suggest turning it off unless you have prob above a 2060 super.

How To Install

Download the zip

Extract it

Open it and run IdkAnymore.exe

Most Stuff Is In Game (Like instructions) But Just An FYI this game was made in 48 hours despite the 7 days time limit. I made ended up making 2 complete fails at the start of the jam.
